title: One Window Properties & Training Institute
slogan: Introducing the most advanced for sale and rent properties and take online training.
slogan2: "Your Window to the perfect Home and wisdom."
who_we_are_msg: One Window Properties and Training Institute is a leading properties and training institute founded and established in Ethiopia in 2021
our_objective_msg: Devotedly provide a broad consultation and marketing services on properties and an excellent training service to satisfy our customers.
our_approach_msg: We provide our service and solution by assisting and advising our customers to get what they are looking for.
our_vision_msg: One Window aspires to excel in customer service to ensure their satisfaction at the heart of everything we do!
what_we_do_msg: Our business provides complete and comprehensive property services and solutions achieved through the following core business activities
sales_and_marketing1_msg: We offer sales and marketing training to help individuals and organizations improve their skills and knowledge in these areas.
digital_marketing1_msg: We empower sales & marketing professionals, customer service, entrepreneur and leaders to master the craft of selling and serving at all levels:
entrepreneur1_msg: The aim of Entrepreneurship training is to provide guidance to trainees who are aspiring to start their own business as well as those who are already running small business and wish to improve their business skills
personal_development1_msg: Our course on Buildings a positive attitude helps the trainees to take better decisions, in an objective manner. It triggers a healthy thought process, enabling our trainees to choose wisely and logically.
property_marketing1_msg: We offer our client a wide selection of prime properties through our effective sales and user friendly website.
property_rental1_msg: Our company find property owner’s the right tenants that suit the life style which their property requires. For short or long terms for tenants.
property_management1_msg: We provides developers, landlords and investors a full range of property management services through a professional property service team and property manager
property_advisory1_msg: We provide independent and objective advisory and consultancy service to property owners.
sales_and_marketing2_msg: Sales and marketing are crucial pillars of every business. They are closely linked and act as a catalyst for generating revenue (profit). While marketing is about building awareness about a brand and organization, sales turn that viewership into profits by converting the potential customers into actual customers. Hence, the sales and marketing session of the training equip trainees through the following important topics which include issues from prospecting to closing of sales.
digital_marketing2_msg: Digital marketing is a huge industry which if used right can take a business from zero to a hundred.
digital_marketing2_msg2: Our digital marketing training gives a more in-depth explanation of the digital marketing and advertisement world and helps explore the procedure and the day to day activity happening in the digital world to deliver the information ads, viewings and frauds through any digital device.
entrepreneur2_msg: The aim of Entrepreneurship training is to provide guidance to trainees who are aspiring to start their own business as well as those who are already running small business and wish to improve their business skills through:
entrepreneur_types1: Introducing the concept and characteristics of entrepreneurship
entrepreneur_types2: Sharing experiences of effective entrepreneurs and skills
entrepreneur_types3: Understanding the basic qualities of entrepreneurs from starting a business to managing to the end.
personal_development2_msg: Our course on Buildings a positive attitude helps the trainees to take better decisions, in an objective manner. It triggers a healthy thought process, enabling our trainees to choose wisely and logically. It helps in motivating to overcome obstacles that they may face during the course of their carrier weather it is on their business or job. Attitude is everything, positive attitude turns every negative environment in to conducive and pleasant for success.
property_marketing2_msg: We offer our clients a wide selection of prime properties through our effective sales and our user friendly website covering all property classes.
property_rental2_msg: Our company fined property owner’s the right tenants that suit the life style which their property requires. Provides a prime location to stay in for short or long terms for tenants.
property_management2_msg: We provides developers, landlords, and investors a full range of property management services through a professional property services team and property managers. Our objective is to handle the day to day needs of your property, minimize vacancies and maximize your bottom line. A well-managed property will serve us an incentive to the tenants to remain in occupation for longer periods. Accordingly, a good management will also ensure that your asset is maintained and costs revenues are budjeted and accounted for.
property_advisory2_msg: ONE WINDOWS advisory unit provides independent and objective advisory and consultancy service to property owners, developers, builders, lenders, and investors on all property related aspects, covering a wide range of issues concerning site locations, demographics, high and best use, master planning and conptualization.
property_advisory2_msg2: Our advisory services also include the folowing :-
gallary_msg: Photo taken during One Window Training
testimony_msg1: I recently sold a house with One Window and while this can be a very stressful process, I felt 100% confident by partnering with One Window. It was candid, provided great feedback, helped explain clearly all details and managed the actual sale negotiation brilliantly. In addition, It was extremely responsive  to every one of my questions, no matter how small.
testimony_msg2: My wife and I had a dream of downsizing from our house in Bole into a small condo closer to where we work. One Window helped make that dream a reality. The sale went smoothly, and we just closed on an ideal new place we're excited to call home. Nobody  knows Addis Ababa and the surrouding area better than One Window. They really listens to clients and goes the extra mile with customers.
testimony_msg3: One Window was a joy to work with! The breath of its local knowledge of Addis Ababa and its enviroment along with a thorough real estate expertise was valuable to us. It took time to introduce us to the market and then showed us lots of houses so we had a great choices to work with. One Window also understood and worked with our time frame, responding quickly to all queries.
testimony_msg4: I was first round trainee at one window Properties and Training institute and I have taken all the courses by the most young and energetic trainers for one month and half.It was really helpful that I can exactly see the bright future in every aspect am engaged in.By developing my confidence and knowledge about how to be an entrepreneur rather than looking for a job.
training_msg: Elevate your performance with Experiential and transformational training courses
